summary: Project lead on a second British Horse Racing Authority project that involves delivering industry-changing applications for the client.
Project lead on UNISON’s migration over to Box UK’s CMS. Main point of contact for the client and responsible for moving the project from QA to UAT and finally to production.

This role involved maintaining Box UK’s high-level XML-based Content Management System (Amaxus), which has been developed at an enterprise level. The CMS has been supporting clients such as Investec, British Energy, Royal Navy and The National Gallery.
The company approached me at the end of my university course. The position required skills to produce comprehensive e-commerce, traditional commerce and online/offline marketing-related solutions.
